attributes.title: No to the no
attributes.review: It is horrible I saw a picture of Donaldtrump naked it was discussing I’m only 10 years old and when I looked at my room everything was orange I saw him every where in my walls floor and bed my covers shoes everything was about Donald trump so I hurried up and deleted the app so it will disappear and it did so if you don’t want to be scared don’t download this app Are you will have nightmares for the rest of your life

attributes.title: Awful just a catastrophic (app) 😨😱
attributes.review: This app was my worst nightmare 👺🛌 , sometimes I wake up and try to remember that I got rid of it.🥺It’s almost like a bad film that you can’t get out of your head and would like to get a refund  🎭  but you would have to make a scene. 💯 I would rather live with my mistake of watching/downloading something so heinous than to yell at other people like my good great friend named Karen though🤗😊✨

attributes.title: Dis is to Donald Trump
attributes.review:
This is the worst app u can ever have he is no gud President and I’m tired of seeing pictures of Cheetos we don’t need bad presidents for 2020 we don’t need racism back we need all good vibes in a president that’s gonna do right and change America like what is this Donald Trump deserves, he deserve not to be in America he doesn’t appreciate everybody in America and to 
me he’s a nobody sorry if this offended people but I’m just speaking facts he just discussed me🤢🤮🤢🤢🤮👎🏾

attributes.title: terrible👎🏽👎🏽
attributes.review: i was looking for a quick way to get my daily news, and this app has done nothing but scam me. i went out for my daily walk around the neighborhood, and after i checked my phone and all of my apps disappeared except for this one. i opened the app and my children and pets raised from the ground and started chanting “trump 2020 trump 2020”. it was obvious that i needed to get rid of this. i tried deleting the app, but a message from the secret service popped up and told me that i was going to pay the price for trying to get rid of the presidents app. i decided to leave the country, change me and my children’s names, and to never return to the usa ever again.

attributes.title: i wish i could rate it less
attributes.review: this app is terrible. i downloaded it barely ten seconds ago and i haven’t even opened the app yet, but my phone has all of these viruses from it!!!! one of them made my phone completely vaporize!! now i am forced to write this review from my kitchen window!!! i demand for this app to be taken down IMMEDIATELY and also for trump to give me a new phone, since his product DESTROYED mine.

attributes.title: Just a terrible app
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see what is was then a photo comes up of orange with a grumpy as face then I keep looking into the app and see a naked orange buttcrack now I’m traumatized I going crying to my mom and show her and she passes out then I show my little sister and she screams and runs into a wall then I show my big sister and she throws my phone through the window and eventually we can’t stop crying.😢😪👎

attributes.title: delete immediately
attributes.review: this app made me profusely vomit and stank so bad the second i clicked download. the person who’s name is in the title also smells as if a narwhal had lasagna for dinner and then had irritable bowel syndrome. please don’t download, this has to be the worst thing i’ve ever seen and the WORST news source in existence since they have absolutely no experience in news or even politics. thank you, good riddens and don’t download this b s.

attributes.title: 0 STARS!!
attributes.review: tragically this app was very poorly made and just like the garbage that was shown through this app, it works like that on the outside. sadly i don’t ever rate apps 1 stars ever, but this is an exception. this app is very bad and spreads false lies that makes ignorant people even more stupid. it’s fake news and idk about y’all, i don’t wanna be brainwashed by the media 👿👿. this app is very awful just like the creator of this app. it was a waste of time.

attributes.title: Stole Ricardo 🤧🤧😪
attributes.review: I downloaded this app bc I love the big orange man in office🥵🤏🏻🍆 but when I opened the app a group of Cheetos broke in my house and stole my puppet Ricardo😫😫😪 I CANNOT GO ON LIKE THIS ANYMORE !!! Ricardo was my everything💔💔 just when I thought it was over I get a message from Ricardo THEY👏🏻 ARE 👏🏻KEEPING👏🏻 HIM 👏🏻IN 👏🏻A 👏🏻FACILITY AND MAKING HIM LISTEN TO SONGS BY NBA YOUNGBOY🤢🤮🤧 I am beyond disgusted with this behavior and I can not longer continue support this overgrown orangutan 💔🦧 I am heartbroken THIS IS MERICA LAND OF THE FREE 🇱🇷🇱🇷🦅LET RICARDO GO !!!!😭😤

attributes.title: absolutely disgusting 😤
attributes.review: I was immediately horrified as soon as the app launched. First I was introduced with a photo of this so called imbecile of a president. This Cheeto of a man, actually he doesn’t earn that name, this Cheeto of a BOY was plastered all over the app. By the way I’d like to see him take a high school English class, he would learn a lot. So thanks to the trump 2020 application I have obtained new eye deficiencies and I will now be needing an upgraded eye prescription.
